== Global Bug Jam hosted by MiLoCo ==

The Michigan LoCo team will be hosting a local event for the GlobalBugJam in August.

=== Event Information ===
Where:  <nowiki>[[http://www.cmpl.org|Clinton Macomb Public Library]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[http://www.cmpl.org/Library/HoursLocations.htm|map]]</nowiki>).

When: August 9th from 1-6pm (depending on activity level)

Who: Your friendly <nowiki>[[MichiganTeam|Michigan LoCo]]</nowiki>

Why: Because it is the GlobalBugJam!

* Things you should know/bring:
** Bring your laptop if you have one
** Be sure you have a <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net|Launchpad]]</nowiki> account.
** To participate in 5-a-day see <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/5-A-Day#head-9f2214e7d3ebde87443f6a596a1fca77c1b76331|this guide]]</nowiki>
** Suggestions on what packages to work on (send them to GregGrossmeier before the event, if you can)
** If you want to confirm bugs on the Development version of Ubuntu (currently Intrepid) see <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuDevelopment/UsingDevelopmentReleases|this guide]]</nowiki>.
** Be ready to have fun!

* Optional (but suggested) informational material:
** HelpingWithBugs - BugSquad landing page: all important information is linked from here.
** <nowiki>[[Bugs-HowToTriage]]</nowiki> will show you how to begin and which steps are to be followed as a bug triager
** <nowiki>[[http://people.ubuntu.com/~dholbach/brian-murray-interview.ogg|Interview with Brian Murray]]</nowiki> (ogg video) - lots of useful information about bug triage. (Full Fresh Ubuntu episode: http://freshubuntu.org/podcast/145/).
** <nowiki>[[http://youtube.com/watch?v=UpnAyzYXvwU|Interview with Brian Murray]]</nowiki> at UDS Intrepid (YouTube video).
